profile_summary:
As a Java Developer with 13+ years of experience, I possess strong expertise in **Java**, **Spring**, and **Microservices**, ensuring the delivery of high-performance applications in compliance-driven environments. I am proficient in **AWS** for cloud deployment and have hands-on experience with **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **CI/CD** processes. My background includes developing **RESTful APIs**, utilizing version control with **GitLab**, and managing infrastructure as code using **Terraform** and **Skaffold**. Additionally, I am skilled in database management with **MongoDB** and **Atlas** and have a solid foundation in **Python** and **JavaScript** development.

With a proven track record in the healthcare and financial sectors, I am adept at building innovative solutions that leverage AI/ML capabilities, enabling predictive analytics and automation. My strong communication skills in English, combined with an Agile development approach, further enhance my ability to work collaboratively within cross-functional teams.
